content: Congratulations, Ezinne! You said yes to your inner self and no to the bullshit surrounding you at work. I’ve reinvented my career many times when I couldn’t keep doing what I was doing one more day and each new job was a better fit and let me to a better place of authenticity and abundance. When we’re willing to surrender for the sake of our souls, it seems we make room in our lives for magic to happen. I pray your magic will come quickly to you. ❤
